  <title>RiverATLAS.shp</title>
  <abstract>Shapefile belonging to the paper "LamaH | Large-Sample Data for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe", submitted to the journal ESSD (Earth System Science Data) in March 2021.

The features in this shapefile show river segments of the dataset "HydroATLAS".

297 attributes, see documentation at:
https://www.hydrosheds.org/images/inpages/HydroRIVERS_TechDoc_v10.pdf
https://www.hydrosheds.org/images/inpages/RiverATLAS_Catalog_v10.pdf
https://www.hydrosheds.org/images/inpages/HydroATLAS_TechDoc_v10.pdf

HydroATLAS dataset is available at:
figshare data repository at https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.9890531

Reference:
Linke, S., Lehner, B., Ouellet Dallaire, C., Ariwi, J., Grill, G., Anand, M., Beames, P., Burchard-Levine, V., Maxwell, S., Moidu, H., Tan, F., and Thieme, M.: Global hydro-environmental sub-basin and river reach characteristics at high spatial resolution, Scientific Data, 6, 283, https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-019-0300-6, 2019.
Lehner, B. and Grill, G.: Global river hydrography and network routing: baseline data and new approaches to study the world’s large river systems, Hydrological Processes, 27(15), 2171–2186, https://doi.org/10.1002/hyp.9740, 2013.</abstract>
